thread.title: 2018 Subaru WRX and WRX STI: Minor Updates for the Rally Warriors
thread.title_full: 2018 Subaru WRX and WRX STI: Minor Updates for the Rally Warriors

author: Tony Markovich
title: 2018 Subaru WRX and WRX STI: Minor Updates for the Rally Warriors
text:
-It has been roughly three years since we first laid eyes on the fourth-generation WRX , which means it’s time for Subaru to introduce a refreshed version. The 2018 WRX and WRX STI receive minor updates, highlighted by new front fascias, revised suspensions, 19-inch wheels on STIs, upgraded Brembo brakes, and an available Performance package for the WRX. But, as previously reported , the cars will continue to live on the existing platform, not the new Subaru Global Platform that made its debut on the redesigned 2017 Impreza sedan and hatchback. READ MORE ›› 
-
